SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivationConfig
Configuration class for neural network activation functions.
ActivationConfigBuilder
Builder class for creating and configuring ActivationConfig instances.
ActivationFunction
Abstract base class for neural network activation functions.
ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION
Enumeration of supported activation function types.
Agent
Represents an individual agent in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
AggregationConfig
Configuration class for neural network aggregation functions.
AggregationFunction
An abstract class defining aggregation functions for neural network nodes.
AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION
Enum representing different types of aggregation functions available for neural network nodes.
ConfigFactory
Factory class for creating standard NEAT configurations.
Connection
Represents a connection between two nodes in a neural network genome.
Genome
Represents a genome in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
Genome.GenomeVisualizationData
Helper class for genome visualization data handling.
GenomeFileHandler
Utility class for handling genome serialization/deserialization and image saving.
GenomeVisualizer
Renders neural network architectures as visual images.
GenomeVisualizer.SHAPE
Enum representing node visualization shapes.
GenomeVisualizerBuilder
Builder class for constructing configured GenomeVisualizer instances.
Neat
Main class implementing the NEAT algorithm workflow.
NEATConfig
Configuration class for NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY
Defines the initial connectivity patterns for creating new genomes.
NEATConfig.DISTRIBUTION
Defines the probability distribution types used for initializing weights, biases, and other numeric parameters.
NEATConfig.FITNESS_CRITERION
Defines the optimization direction for fitness evaluation.
NEATConfig.SELECTION_TYPE
Defines the selection methods used for choosing parent genomes during reproduction.
NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION
Defines how to calculate the fitness of a species from its member genomes.
NEATConfigBuilder
Builder class for creating and configuring NEAT algorithm parameters.
Node
Represents a node in a neural network genome within the NEAT algorithm.
Node.TYPE
Enum representing node types in the neural network.
TestXOR
Demonstrates NEAT algorithm solving the XOR logic gate problem.
